summary:
Dynamic, results-oriented, self-motivated Commercial Planning & Revenue Growth Manager with +10 years of experience in leading multi-national companies. Ability to manage internal/ external stakeholders  and recognized as handling multiple tasks while meeting deadlines. Strong passion and strength in customer development and channel understanding to develop creative and innovative solutions to win in all channels.
Always honored with positive & contributive approach across all levels within the organization through collaborative mindset.
Areas of expertise:
Revenue & Profit Optimization, Budget & Forecasting, Marketing Strategy, Promotion & Pricing, Inventory Management ,Demand Planning, Cross-functional Collaboration, Relationship Building, Problem Solving, Team Management

profile_positions.description:
•	Responsible for markets Italy, DACH, Nordics, Central Europe, Caribbean and Afrex markets and working with key stakeholders across regions to deliver aligned revenue growth targets
•	Leading projects and initiatives of long term revenue growth strategy across five RGM levers of Price, Promotion, Trade Investment, PPA and Mix to ensure consistent YOY revenue generation and drive profitable growth
•	Managing and tracking RGM scorecards with building connections with IBP, markets monthly & quarterly reviews and demand review meetings
•	Utilizing existing RGM tools and developing new cross functional & market solutions with the knowledge of consumer analytics like Nielsen,IRI and GFK platforms
•	Engaging with external RGM specialists within RGM community through all SBFE markets to share best practices and generate new insights
•	Developing RGM mindset inside the organization through job experiences
profile_positions.title: Revenue Growth Manager,License

profile_positions.description:
•	Supervising a team of 10 direct reports, responsible for driving sustainable and efficient growth in all beauty categories(Fragrance, Make up, Facial & Body Care, Toiletries)  as well as securing profitability and increasing market share both in Turkey & NAME markets ( Morocco & Egypt) 
•	Managing annual budget & resources of Commercial Planning to ensure maximum contribution to Avon's strategic priorities and targets across all channels & markets
•	Developing and upgrading channel (Direct Sales, E-Commerce, Retail) specific promotional plans with a focus on consumer needs / channels strategies as well as maximizing ROI & productivity
•	Building and executing Revenue Growth Strategy: Pricing, Mix, Trade Architecture & Promotion on different levels (country, category, customer, portfolio, channel) in all responsible markets (TR,MO,EG)
•	Defining long term pricing strategies using internal & external RGM tools in order to boost competitive positioning in the BPC market and drive profitable revenue growth
•	Being part of the Avon Global RGM community with other Avon Top 10 markets ( e.g. Russia, South Africa, UK, Spain) presenting latest insights on RGM levers ( innovation, discounting, gross margin etc.) to identify growth opportunities
•	Working seamlessly with regional/global stakeholders (Finance, Supply Chain, Category Teams,  Analytics , Omnichannel and Senior management) in order to communicate effectively RGM insights and commercial initiatives 
•	Participating in various strategic projects in order to reignite Avon brand & increase consumer penetration such as AYR Gifting, FR Downtrading
•	Focusing on team engagement for long term achievements and mentoring each team member to discover the potential and develop capabilities. Participated in Avon Mentorship program as mentor and mentee.
profile_positions.title: Head of Commercial Planning and Revenue Growth Management (Turkey&NAME)

profile_positions.description:
•	Help driving growth in all beauty (Make Up, Fragrance, Skin Care, Personal Care & Hair Care) & Fashion categories (as in profit plan numbers) with customer oriented and distinctive promotions in the market as well as securing profitability
•	Detailed knowledge of market & consumer trends both retail for online and main competitors strategies in order to feed into strategies and develop Turkey local sales plans
•	Responsible for all elements of the commercial planning, ensuring maximum balance between KPIs, ROI whilst working within budget constraints, with high analytical skills
•	High level of co-ordination amongst all marketing functions. Close relationships with other functions on a daily basis, like finance, demand planning, business analytics and field teams. Being person of contact for any kind team related issues.
•	Consistent presentation of commercial initiatives and business cases in a weekly level in English for a great variety of stakeholders, especially for top management. 
•	Ability to manage associates in the team and supporting colleagues cross-functionally under “One team, One Avon” philosophy
profile_positions.title: Marketing Commercial Planning Lead

profile_positions.description:
•	End-to-End 360 commercial planning in total 7 out of 18 brochures Avon produces on monthly basis in 2016&2017, which corresponds to 100M $ sales in TR Market (leading 2 most important brochures of Turkey, “New Year Campaign” in 2 consecutive years)
•	Design of consistent marketing strategies built upon seasonality, local consumer inputs (Nielsen, IPSOS) and tracking of competitors
•	Consistently managing and engaging internal departments and external partners including category product managers, demand forecasting, creative, finance, supply chain, print and production as well as top management
•	Maximizing more than 6 categories (Make Up, Fragrance, Skin Care, Personal Care & Hair Care in addition Fashion & Home) to maximize category positioning in store as well as pricing and promotions
•	Managing pricing, selling strategies and promotional programs to drive extra sales. Executing game-changing sales actions to maximize low performing products, engaging more than 300K sales reps in less than 48H
profile_positions.title: Senior Marketing Commercial Planner

profile_positions.description:
•	Developing demand forecasts (operational forecasts) at multiple levels of aggregation for mobile phones, note PC, printer and camera spare parts
•	Coordinating cross functional parties; “10 overseas Samsung Vendor” through  “authorized 300 service points” with 25M $ annual sales volume
•	Managing inventory targets with developing strategies on existing items, new products and product phase – outs and evaluating forecast results
•	Adjusting forecast and inventory based on changes in demand and market trends, maintaining safety stock levels (13.8M$ target for 2015)
•	Utilizing a collaborative and consensus approach by working with Sales, Finance and logistics teams to obtain and ensure that current and accurate information is used for demand forecasts
•	Using and maintaining demand planning module in SAP (SMRP) as the primary forecasting tool.
•	Measuring performance of suppliers in order to ensure on time delivery of spare parts to customers, generating action plans in any case of late delivery
•	Preparing and maintaining relevant KPI reports including inventory levels, forecast cycle times and customer delivery times
profile_positions.title: Demand Planning Team Leader

profile_positions.description:
•	Working with 110 suppliers from Far East & Europe for Arcelik’s outsourced white & brown goods’ spare parts
•	Creating sales forecasts based on historical trends, service call rates , seasonality and product life cycle and initiating the order placement process to suppliers
•	Managing supply and inventory of spare parts ensuring systematically allocated and delivered to all suppliers, complete in quantity, in good quality condition, on the most economical and timely basis
•	Calculating optimal safety stock levels using a mixture of statistical/manual approaches in order to maximize parts availability and minimize stock holding
•	Minimizing obsolete and excess stocks by identifying and agreeing action plans in order to achieve agreed stockholding targets
•	Analyzing and effectively communicating relevant information, highlighting all supply issues and proposing quick actions in order to maximize customer satisfaction
profile_positions.title: Demand Planning&Supply Engineer
